summary: This is an email exchange regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell verdict. An FBI agent from Boston inquires about having a Special Agent present on Maxwell's capture, but the recipient clarifies they are not involved in the Maxwell case and suggests contacting someone named Amanda.

persons.name: Sony
persons.context: Addressed in the email as the person who might need direction regarding the Maxwell case verdict.

persons.name: Amanda
persons.context: Suggested by the email sender as someone who can provide correct information or access regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the verdict being discussed; her case and capture are the topics of the email inquiry.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Verdict
events.description: The date of the Ghislaine Maxwell verdict is referenced, with an FBI agent seeking to arrange a presentation about her capture.

keyFacts: The email is dated June 28, 2022, which is the day of the Ghislaine Maxwell verdict.
An FBI agent from Boston expresses interest in having a Special Agent present on the topic of Maxwell's capture.
The recipient of the email states they are not involved in the Maxwell case, indicating separate FBI units or responsibilities.
